title: Video: Stray Kites- The Ghoster
content:
This is probably one of the most wonderfully angelic videos I’ve seen.

Made by the fantastic KEEL HER, using family home videos featuring her and her CITR writer brother (Ben Keeler) no less, this disjointed and wobbly piece of footage will leave you filled with nostalgia.

Pick up the track and Stray Kites latest LP, Mieux, over at their Bandcamp.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
